HeaderSettings.Heading: A **Typin** interactive examples page.
Subheading: *Typin* is pronounced as /*Type in*/

Links.Title: Report an issue

Examples.Name: HelloWorld
Examples.Description: A basic example of Typin usage that writes 'Hello World' to a terminal. Additionaly, it presents a basic usage of parameters, options, and cancellation token.
QuickStart: To QuickStart A basic example of Typin usage that writes 'Hello World' to a terminal. Additionaly, it presents a basic usage of parameters, options, and cancellation token.
